scripts.db-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id fxewzungnacaxpsnowcu --schema public > database.types.ts
scripts.codegen: graphql-codegen && grep -v "PoolId = 'pool__id',\|BetId = 'bet__id'," src/types/__generated__/graphql.ts > temp.ts && mv temp.ts src/types/__generated__/graphql.ts
